Package com.advertisementproject.permissionservice.messagebroker.publisher

Class MessagePublisher

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.permissionservice.messagebroker.publisher.MessagePublisher
@Service
public class MessagePublisher
extends java.lang.Object
MessagePublisher is a service for publishing messages asynchronously to other microservices via RabbitMQ. RabbitTemplate is used to send the message and ObjectMapper is used to convert objects to JSON

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper  
    private org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.core.RabbitTemplate rabbitTemplate  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MessagePublisher()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void sendPermissionMessage​(Permission permission)
    Sends a permission object to a fanout exchange so that any microservice that needs to be updated about when permission is created or updated can receive the update by having a queue connected to the exchange.
    void sendPermissionsDeleteMessage​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Sends a user id to a fanout exchange so that any microservice that needs to be updated about when permission is removed for a user can receive the update by having a queue connected to the exchange.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • rabbitTemplate

  • Constructor Details

    • MessagePublisher

      public MessagePublisher()

  • Method Details

    • sendPermissionMessage

      public void sendPermissionMessage​(Permission permission)
      Sends a permission object to a fanout exchange so that any microservice that needs to be updated about when permission is created or updated can receive the update by having a queue connected to the exchange.
      Parameters:
      permission - the permissions object that has been created or updated

    • sendPermissionsDeleteMessage

      public void sendPermissionsDeleteMessage​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Sends a user id to a fanout exchange so that any microservice that needs to be updated about when permission is removed for a user can receive the update by having a queue connected to the exchange.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id for the user who's permission has been removed
